title: srikara mamava
sahitya:
shrIkara mAmava shrIkNThEshvara shrI gaurIsha surEsha mahEshvara

anupallavi

 pAka harAdinuta pramathEshvara pAda natAvanapara paramEshvara

caraNam

 kAmada tANDava naTana vishArada kAlAntaka hrta sujana viSAda 
kAmArE shambhO mangala varada kAnana tulasI vilvArcitapada
